tweet: I am inundated by people asking me for recommendations on cryptocurrencies. If you would use your heads you would figure out that the privacy coins  (anonymous transactions) will have the greatest future. Coins like Monero (XMR), Verge (XVG), or Zcash (ZEC) cannot lose.
PSA: #Bitcoin is a gateway drug. The vast majority of users start quickly experimenting with $ETH, $LTC, $DASH, $XMR, and $ZEC.  Stay safe out there.
